content: the pistachio ice cream cowl feels like a warm hug on a chilly day the faux rib adds a lot of visual interest to the design as well as giving it a squishy scrumptious texture i made my small sample in a color block design and my large sample in a single color but try experimenting with any color design you d like it s very easy to adjust to your liking made in bulky yarn this is a quick and easy project perfect for last minute gifts or to treat yourself this cowl is worked from side to side seamed with a slip_stitch at the edges you can easily adjust this to your preferred width and length although there are only two sizes in the pattern there are two options one for a cowl that sits around your neck s and one for a cowl that wraps around twice l here are how the sizes will be displayed s l if there is only one number follow those instructions for both sizes my green/white sample is in size s my light green sample was made in size l you can do it in solids stripes or color blocks this is an intermediate level pattern as you need to know fpdc and basic slip_stitch seaming feel free to sell as many of the finished objects as you wish i ask that if you post on social media you would include a link to the pattern and give credit to me stopitharry on ravelry i will also provide pattern support so just message me on ravelry if you have any issues one thing that would be helpful to me as a newbie designer would be for you to rate the pattern when you are finished i would also love social media shares and pattern reviews in your notes thanks in advance i want to say a huge thank you to my wonderful tester handmadeknitwear /people/handmadeknitwear
